title: Neighborhoos Sign Font!
content:
I'm creating a website for this communities HOA and would really like to incorporate this font in a couple of places. Any ideas on what this font is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [crystal-crossing.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017233440/http:/typophile.com/files/crystal-crossing.jpg) | 132.44 KB |
author: hobbs6487

comments.content: Sorry for the misspelling in the title...
Thanks Atwe. Staring at it all these years I never realized. What is worrisome is that I use both fonts regularly.
